Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
dehydrated \dehydrated\ adj. 1. thoroughly dried out.
Syn: desiccated, dried-out. [WordNet 1.5]
2. suffering from fluid deprivation; as, to become deydrated from overexertion on a hot day. [WordNet 1.5]

dehydrated adj 1: suffering from excessive loss of water from the body; "fever resulted from becoming dehydrated"; "was dehydrated after the marathon" 2: preserved by removing natural moisture; "dried beef"; "dried fruit"; "dehydrated eggs"; "shredded and desiccated coconut meat" [syn: {dried}, {desiccated}]
